üè∑Ô∏è "Perfectly sweet and tart. Taste varies on this one. Most people taste pear and watermelon combinations. Pair with coconut and other tropical flavors." -  [Lychee - Delosi](https://delosilabs.com/flavoring/fruits-and-nuts/lychee-concentrated-flavoring.html)

​

üí¨ 1/05/2018 Correspondence - Sam @ delosilabs.com

General Usage Guideline: 5 - 7% (account for variances for flavor profiles)

Mints Menthol Tobaccos: 3 - 5%

Natural Occurring Citrus: Fruit Punch, Lemons, Limes, Grapefruit, Oranges etc: 1-3%

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

Aroma Stick: Moderately Strong. Floral & Tropical...not quite Lychee

​

Single Flavor Test:  5%

60/40 | 0 Nic | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | asMODus C4 RDA | Organic Japanese Cotton

\_ \_ \_ \_ \_

1 Week Steep

‚ñ∫Vape: Slight Changes
